original_text: Because you cherished perpetual enmity and gave over the people of Israel to the power of the sword at the time of their calamity, at the time of their final punishment,
korean_text: 네가 옛날부터 한을 품고 이스라엘 족속의 환난 때 곧 죄악의 마지막 때에 칼의 위력에 그들을 넘겼도다

sentences.original_text: and gave over the people of Israel to the power of the sword
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이스라엘 백성을 칼의 권세에 넘겨주었다

sentences.original_text: at the time of their calamity,
at the time of their final punishment,
